definition: short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: I lost my pocket-book, but I recovered it from the police station.
sentences.chinese: 我把錢包弄丟了，但在警察局找回來了。

sentences.english: The picture shows a hawker used the police signs resist rain in Delhi.
sentences.chinese: 圖爲德里，一名小販利用警察局招牌擋雨。

sentences.english: Dexter is a serial killer who lends his talent to the Miami Metro Police Department.
sentences.chinese: 德柯斯特是一個連環殺手，在邁阿密警察局任職。

sentences.english: The suspect was marched to the police station.
Hernandez was taken to the police station after being arrested for defaulting on his contract.
sentences.chinese: 埃爾南德斯因在合同上違約而被捕並被送往警察局。

sentences.english: Wyatt shows up at the police station and seesMahone in the cell.
sentences.chinese: 懷亞特在警察局出現，發現了馬宏被關在號子裏。

sentences.english: Police are now on the lookout for these boat thieves.
sentences.chinese: 這羣盜船賊現在關押在警察局。

sentences.english: At the police station, everything he said was taken down.
sentences.chinese: 在警察局，他說的每句話都被記了下來。

sentences.english: He formerly served in the Iran-Iraq war and as national police chief.
sentences.chinese: 他以前曾在伊朗伊拉克戰爭中服役，並擔任警察局長。

sentences.english: Maybe I'll be the last ever male police chief.
sentences.chinese: 也許我會成爲最後一屆男性警察局長。

sentences.english: 'The Police Department has a much better radio communications system than the Fire Department, ' Mr. Corbett said.
sentences.chinese: 科貝特說，“警察局的無線電就比消防局強得多。

sentences.english: Guess who had a very interesting conversation with the police on their doorstep?
sentences.chinese: 於是我在警察局跟警察叔叔們聊得好開心哦。
警察局長李剛兒子獲刑6年。

sentences.english: Radha is the daughter of the Chief of Police.
sentences.chinese: 羅陀是警察局長的女兒。

sentences.english: The suspect was subjected to cross-examination at the police station.
sentences.chinese: 嫌疑犯在警察局受到盤問。

sentences.english: After three days, the hijackers surrendered to the police .
sentences.chinese: 三天後，劫機犯向警察局自首了。

definition: police department/police station/abbr. of 警察局
police station (abbr. for 警察署[jing3 cha2 shu3])
public security bureau (government office similar in function to a police station)
the Kempeitai or Japanese Military Police 1881-1945 (Japanese counterpart of the Gestapo during WWII)
(old) police station in a foreign concession 租界[zu1 jie4]
